It all depends if you are only concerned with testing
the Public methods then it does not need to be in the
same package but if you want to test all the methods
then same package will work.  It all depends on how
concerned you are with accessing non public methods.

Ty

--- Mark Xu <xudianm@...> wrote:
> should it be the same as the packge for the source
> codes been tested or not?
> 
> my colleagues argued that it makes it easy to test
> the protected methods or packge scope methods if
> they live in the same package.
> 
> thanks,
> Mark
